The '''Greater Gelion''' was one of the two rivers that flowed together to form the source of long [[Gelion]], that flowed along the eastern borders of [[Beleriand]]. The Greater Gelion rose beneath [[Mount Rerir]] in the northern [[Blue Mountains]], and flowed southwestwards to meet the [[Little Gelion]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref> It formed the eastern boundary of the lands controlled by [[Maglor]] during most of the late [[First Age]].<ref>{{S|Beleriand}}</ref>
